1280.description: Help the Bradford Rant Institute of Cosmic Kinesis uncover the secret of the Pods!

1285.description: Smash 25 glowing Mantis statues in Forbidden Valley.

1288.description: Find the 5 treasure chests that Johnny Thunder hid in Starbase 3001.

1294.description: Collect 5 Backpack Flags in LEGO Club.

1301.description: Talk to 4 female fans at Red Blocks in Nimbus Station about meeting Johnny Thunder.

1302.description: Talk to 4 female fans at Red Blocks in Nimbus Station about meeting Johnny Thunder.

1303.description: Talk to 4 female fans at Red Blocks in Nimbus Station about meeting Johnny Thunder.

1308.description: Use both of the binoculars in Starbase 3001.

1309.description: Talk to 4 female fans at Red Blocks in Nimbus Station about meeting Johnny Thunder.

1310.description: Smash Blastbreath, the Maelstrom Dragon in Forbidden Valley.

1311.description: Smash Torchblight, the Maelstrom Dragon in Forbidden Valley.

1312.description: Smash Burnshout, the Maelstrom Dragon in Forbidden Valley.

1323.description: Deliver the welder to Unit 32 on the statue.

1327.description: Smash Icecubes to find snow shoes.

1331.description: Collect 5 Fuel Rods from the crates.

1332.description: Talk to Brickmaster Clang in Forbidden Valley.

1359.description: Discover all of the points of interest in Avant Gardens, Nimbus Station, Pet Cove, Gnarled Forest, and Forbidden Valley.

1360.description: Find all 5 points of interest in Avant Gardens.

1361.description: Buy a Sentinel Shield from Klaus Zett, the Gear Vendor in the Sentinel Base Camp.

1362.description: Equip the Sentinel Shield and use the Shielding Skill.

1364.description: Find 2 Drumsticks for Peppy Slapbiscuit, who wants to play the drums at the Red Blocks concert.

1365.description: Buy a replacement for Peppy's Ugly Mug from a vendor in Avant Gardens.

1366.description: Find Nate the Snake, who is hiding somewhere in Nimbus Plaza!

1381.description: Read the Rank 1 Space Ranger book.

1382.description: Read the Rank 2 Space Ranger book.

1383.description: Read the Rank 3 Space Ranger book.

1388.description: Talk to Forge Honcho in Starbase 3001 and gain access to the World Builder Rocket Pad.

1389.description: Return to Beck Strongheart in the Sentinel Base Camp.

1391.description: Collect 16 Heart Flags on Crux Prime.

1392.description: Collect 5 Backpack Flags on Crux Prime.

1394.description: Collect the Imagination Brick on Crux Prime.

1395.description: Find the 8 treasure chests that Johnny Thunder hid on Crux Prime.

1398.description: Speak to Honor Accolade in the Sentinel vendor area about his unique items.

1400.description: Look for the mysterious gray Ninja at the Ninjago Ruins on Crux Prime.

1401.description: Charge up and release a Spinjitzu attack using the Spinjitzu Double-Bladed Dagger.

1402.description: Use Spinjitzu to smash 10 Skeleton Miners in the Maelstrom Quarry on Crux Prime.

1403.description: Find 10 Ninjago Scrolls on Crux Prime.

1404.description: Interact with Neido's shrine to read his scrolls.

1405.description: Destroy 10 Bone Fracture Bombs in the Maelstrom Quarry on Crux Prime.

1406.description: Smash and then rebuild 3 Skeleton Growlspeakers in the Maelstrom Quarry.

1407.description: Smash a Skeleton Drilling Rig in the Maelstrom Quarry on Crux Prime.

1408.description: Gather 6 schematic pages from the Skeletons in the Watchtowers.

1409.description: Get a Maelstrom Crystal from Nuckal, the Skeleton General on Crux Prime.

1410.description: Collect 10 Aura Blossoms on Crux Prime and return them to Neido.

1411.description: Find Sherland Powers, the Nexus Force Pilot, somewhere on Crux Prime.

1412.description: Sherland Powers was hurt in the crash. Buy a BBQ Drumstick to heal his injuries.

1416.description: Smash 15 Stromling Admirals on Crux Prime.

1423.description: Quick Build 1 Shield Generator on Crux Prime.

1424.description: Talk to Sky Lane at the Launch Area in Avant Gardens.

1425.description: Talk to Echs Rays at the Paradox Refinery in Forbidden Valley.

1426.description: Get some of Neido's Imagination Tea for Brannan Landers on Crux Prime.

1428.description: Use the Skeleton Dragon Pet to dig up 10 Bone Digs on Crux Prime.

1429.description: Talk to Mardolf the Orange in Nimbus Station about your new Skeleton Dragon pet.

1431.description: Smash Talli Reeko on Crux Prime!

1435.description: Follow the Venture League logos to find Hael Storm in his Observatory.

1437.description: Duke Exeter wants you to talk to Hael Storm in the Venture League Observatory.

1438.description: Follow the Paradox logos to find Vanda Darkflame in the Paradox Laboratory.

1440.description: Duke Exeter wants you to talk to Vanda Darkflame in the Paradox Laboratory.

1442.description: Follow the Assembly logos to find Dr. Overbuild in the Nexus Core.

1443.description: Quick Build an Imagination Pipe in the Nexus Core.

1447.description: Duke Exeter wants you to talk to Dr. Overbuild in the Nexus Core.

1448.description: Follow the Sentinel logos to find Duke Exeter in the Command Center.

1449.description: Use your combat skills to cause 25 points of damage in the Combat Challenge.

1470.description: Discover all 3 points of interest in Frostburgh.

1471.description: Use all 3 of the Binoculars in Frostburgh.

1476.description: Smash 25 more icy rocks in Frostburgh.

1478.description: Quick Build 25 more snowmen in Frostburgh.

1480.description: Complete 10 non-daily Missions or Achievements in Frostburgh.

1481.description: Complete 10 more non-daily Missions or Achievements in Frostburgh, for a total of 20.

1489.description: Use 5 speed pads in the Venture League hallway in Nexus Tower.

1490.description: Use 2 vacuum tubes in the Assembly hallway in Nexus Tower.

1491.description: Use 4 teleporters in the Paradox area of Nexus Tower.

1492.description: Use 5 moving walkways in the Sentinel hallway in Nexus Tower.

1497.description: Use all 10 of the Binoculars on Crux Prime.

1498.description: Read all of the Story Plaques on Crux Prime.

1499.description: Discover Sentinel Point Zeta on Crux Prime.

1500.description: Discover Caldera Mar on Crux Prime.

1501.description: Discover the Maelstrom Quarry on Crux Prime.

1502.description: Discover the Ninjago Ruins on Crux Prime.

1503.description: Discover Aura Mar on Crux Prime.

1504.description: Discover Rivendark Canyon on Crux Prime.

1505.description: Discover all 6 points of interest on Crux Prime.

1519.description: Return to the Venture Explorer and check in with Epsilon Starcracker.

1526.description: Smash 50 Hammer Stromlings on the Venture Explorer.

1527.description: Smash 250 more Hammer Stromlings on the Venture Explorer.

1528.description: Smash 25 Corrupted Sentries on the Venture Explorer.

1529.description: Smash 125 more Corrupted Sentries on the Venture Explorer.

1530.description: Smash 10 Elite Dark Spiderlings on the Venture Explorer.

1531.description: Smash 50 more Elite Dark Spiderlings on the Venture Explorer.
